Package it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.structure

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.model.structure.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the gaming board of a player, in which he can place cards.

    • getFaces

      public List<Face> getFaces()
      Returns for each resource the number of occurrences in the board
      Returns:
      a list that contains the faces put in the board

    • getTotalResources

      public Map<Resource,Integer> getTotalResources()
      Returns for each resource the number of occurrences in the board
      Returns:
      a map, where the keys are the resources and the values are the number of occurrences

    • getPossiblePositions

      public Set<Position> getPossiblePositions()
      Returns the possible positions where you can insert a card
      Returns:
      availablePositions, a set with all the possible placeable positions

    • getNearbyFaces

      public Map<Direction,Face> getNearbyFaces(Position pos)
      Returns the list of the faces nearby the one given in input
      Parameters:
      pos - the position of the face that will be analysed

    • addFace

      public void addFace(Face face)
      Adds this face to the list of faces and updates the lastPlacedCard then it calls the updateResources() method
      Parameters:
      face - the face chosen to be placed
